reviewText:
Overall, this is a well paced, character driven film. The characters are interesting, have depth, flaws and are sympathetic.

I've come to think that Jeremy Piven might be the most underrated and under utilized actor in Hollywood. This little known gem of a small film show Piven's versatility as both a comedic and dramatic actor.  If you're a fan of Piven because of Entourage, this film might be of interest to viewers as it helps to showcase his talent.
This is a very good film.  Good script; good score; good art direction; great cast.  Too bad it didn't get more play in theatres.
